com.github.ysl3000.bukkit.pathfinding.pathfinding

Interface PathfinderGoal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PathfinderGoalFollowEntity, PathfinderGoalGimmiCookie, PathfinderGoalMoveToLocation, PathfinderGoalReturnToLocation, PathfinderGoalSteerEntity, PathfinderGoalWalkToSteakAndEat, TalkToStrangers

    public PathfinderGoal

    Created by Yannick on 30.11.2016.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Is called when .shouldExecute returns true
      void init()
      Runs initially and should be used to setUp goalEnvironment Condition needs to be defined thus your code in it isn't called
      void reset()
      Reset the pathfinder AI pack to its initial state
      boolean shouldExecute()
      Whether the pathfinder goal should commence execution or not
      boolean shouldTerminate()
      Whether the goal should Terminate

    • Method Detail

      • shouldExecute

        boolean shouldExecute()

        Whether the pathfinder goal should commence execution or not

        Returns:
        true if should execute

      • shouldTerminate

        boolean shouldTerminate()

        Whether the goal should Terminate

        Returns:
        true if should terminate

      • init

        void init()

        Runs initially and should be used to setUp goalEnvironment Condition needs to be defined thus your code in it isn't called

      • execute

        void execute()

        Is called when .shouldExecute returns true

        See Also:
        .shouldExecute

      • reset

        void reset()

        Reset the pathfinder AI pack to its initial state

        Is called when .shouldExecute returns false

        See Also:
        .shouldExecute
